Title: SpotifyRemote
Description: Small .NET 3.5 based app to control the Spotify (http://www.spotify.com/) client from a webbased interface suitable for mobile devices such as iPod/iPhone.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Small .NET 3.5 based app to control the Spotify (http://www.spotify.com/) client from a webbased interface suitable for mobile devices such as iPod/iPhone.

SpotifyAPI

This project also contains a simple API to communicate with the Spotify client. The API got most basic features implemented such as play/pause, next/prev, current playing song info. Download file "APIDemo.zip" to see what it can do.
